Name: ApgarTimingVS
Title: APGAR Score Timing
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent standard timings for APGAR assessments.

Name: BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClassVS
Title: Birth and Fetal Death Financial Class
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent birth and fetal death financial class. This valueset is based on  [PHVS_BirthAndFetalDeathFinancialClass_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=D20CD804-8487-E311-AE2A-0017A477041A). using codes from the [Source of Payment Typology](https://terminology.hl7.org/3.0.0/CodeSystem-SOPT.html) codesystem.

Name: BirthAttendantTitlesVS
Title: Birth Attendants Titles
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of birth attendant titles. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthAttendantTitles_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=7B108BDB-5F50-482F-9E9D-643EC75364A2)

Name: BirthDeliveryOccurredVS
Title: Birth Delivery Occurred
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of place where birth or delivery occurred. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthDeliveryOccurred_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BC64CB23-8210-4CE0-B2AE-F45169BBDC51)

Name: BirthWeightEditFlagsVS
Title: Birth Weight Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Birth Weight Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthWeightEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=FA7A83A3-FCFD-E611-A856-0017A477041A)

Name: DeliveryRoutesVS
Title: Delivery Routes
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Delivery Routes. This valueset is based on [PHVS_DeliveryRoutes_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=0C9E4D45-3FFD-4E97-AEF3-18CE5B878F46)

Name: EstimateOfGestationEditFlagsVS
Title: Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Estimate of Gestation Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_EstimateOfGestationEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7567)

Name: FetalDeathCauseOrConditionVS
Title: Fetal Death Cause or Condition
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death cause or condition.  This valueset is based on [PHVS_FetalDeathCauseOrCondition_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=DC1C6A94-C9FF-42CD-B546-E789003ED793).

Name: FetalDeathTimePointsVS
Title: Fetal Death Time Points
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal death time points. This valueset is based on [PHVS_FetalDeathTimePoints_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=52F8C812-2C70-4038-8F0F-D6E0532D4EBD)

Name: FetalPresentationsVS
Title: Fetal Presentations
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. This valueset is based on  [PHVS_FetalPresentations_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=3C696B7B-BB33-4818-8996-1E3461E3F512).   Only these codes are supported for exchange with NCHS.

Name: FetalPresentationsMaxVS
Title: Fetal Presentations - Max
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent fetal presentations. It expands on the [FetalPresentationsVS] by including intensionally all codes for abnormal presentations,  as suggested by [FHIR-44554](https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-44554).

Name: FetalRemainsDispositionMethodVS
Title: Fetal Remains Disposition Method VS
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Fetal Remains Method of Disposition. This valueset is based on [PHVS_FetalRemainsDispositionMethod_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7585). It differs from the [MethodOfDispositionVS] valueset in that includes 'Hospital Disposition', but not 'Entombment'.

Name: HistologicalPlacentalExaminationVS
Title: Histological Placental Examination
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent histological placental examinations. This valueset is based on [PHVS_HistologicalPlacentalExamination_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=82BF4C7F-D01F-4019-A1E1-9F7CAACB7FC6)

Name: InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirthVS
Title: Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Infections During Pregnancy Live Birth. This valueset is based on [PHVS_InfectionsDuringPregnancyLiveBirth_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=AEF5A3D4-960C-4194-8BB6-392C7282D216). Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.

Name: InformantRelationshipToMotherVS
Title: Informant Relationship to Mother
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent informants relationship to mother. This valueset is based on [PHVS_InformantRelationshiptoMother_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=ADF95682-912A-E711-BE3F-0017A477041A).

Name: LocationTypeVS
Title: Location Types
Descriptino: Valueset for location types used to differentate transfer and birth locations

Name: NewbornCongenitalAnomaliesVS
Title: Newborn Congenital Anomalies
Descriptino: The valueset contains codes to represent newborn congenital anomalies. This valueset is based on [PHVS_NewbornCongenitalAnomalies_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BC64CB23-8210-4CE0-B2AE-F45169BBDC51). Includes 'Other' value for general utility, although #OTH is not allowed for birth submissions to NCHS.

Name: NumberPreviousCesareansEditFlagsVS
Title: Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Number of Previous Cesareans Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_NumberOfPreviousCesareansEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=C5BC6D8B-DDFA-E611-A856-0017A477041A)

Name: ValueSetObstetricProcedureOutcome
Title: Obstetric Procedure Outcome
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes that represent the successful or unsuccessful outcome of an obstretric procedure

Name: PregnancyReportEditFlagsVS
Title: Pregnancy Report Edit Flags (NCHS)
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent Pregnancy Report Edit Flags. This valueset is based on [PHVS_PregnancyReportEditFlags_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=BD25B456-85EC-45D7-B578-1024EE2920F4). Used for MothersHeight, MothersDeliveryWeight, MothersPrepregnancyWeight, NumberPrenatalCareVisits

Name: ValueSetUnitsOfGestationalAge
Title: Units of Gestational Age Vital
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes for specifying the units used when recording gestational age (days, weeks.).  Reporting to NCHS is always in units of weeks, but other users of the associated [ObservationGestationalAgeAtDelivery] profile may want to record days.

Name: CigaretteSmokingBeforeAndDuringPregnancyVS
Title: Cigarette Smoking Before and During Pregnancy
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the number of cigarettes smoked in specific periods before and during pregnancy.

Name: ValueSetBirthAttendantTitlesVitalRecords
Title: Birth Attendants Titles Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains codes to represent the type of birth attendant titles. This valueset is based on [PHVS_BirthAttendantTitles_NCHS](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?id=7B108BDB-5F50-482F-9E9D-643EC75364A2)  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapBirthAttendantTitlesVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetBirthplaceCountryVitalRecords
Title: Birthplace Country Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent 2 Letter Birthplace Country Codes from GEC and ISO 3166-1.  Includes historic countries that no longer exist.

Name: ValueSetEducationLevelVitalRecords
Title: Education Level Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent the Highest educational level achieved.    Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapEducationLevelVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetResidenceCountryVitalRecords
Title: Residence Country Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent 2 Letter Residence Country Codes from GEC and ISO 3166-1.  Excludes historic countries that no longer exist

Name: ValueSetSexAssignedAtBirthVitalRecords
Title: Sex Assigned At Birth Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the subset of the US Core Birth Sex Valueset that can be used for a child or decedent fetus' Vital Records.    Mapping to IJE codes [here for child](ConceptMap-ConceptMapBirthSexChildVitalRecords.html) and [here for decedent fetus](ConceptMap-ConceptMapBirthSexFetusVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetStatesTerritoriesAndProvincesVitalRecords
Title: States
Descriptino: Territories and Provinces Vital Records
Uses: This valueset contains the set of codes used to represent 2 Letter States and Provinces

Name: ValueSetUSStatesVitalRecords
Title: US States Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of 2 Letter codes used to represent the 50 US States and DC

Name: ValueSetUSTerritoriesVitalRecords
Title: US Territories Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of 2 Letter codes used to represent US Territories

Name: ValueSetYesNoNotApplicableVitalRecords
Title: Yes No Not Applicable Vital Records
Descriptino: A set of codes used to respond to any question that can be answered Yes, No, or Not Applicable. Based on [Yes No Not Applicable (NCHS)[2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486]](https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7486)  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapYesNoNotApplicableVitalRecords.html).

Name: ValueSetYesNoUnknownVitalRecords
Title: Yes No Unknown Vital Records
Descriptino: This valueset contains the set of codes used to respond to any question that can be answered Yes, No, or Unknown.  Mapping to IJE codes [here](ConceptMap-ConceptMapYesNoUnknownVitalRecords.html).

Name: PHVS_CauseOfFetalDeath_ICD-10_CDC
Title: Cause of Fetal Death ICD-10
Descriptino: This value set contains the ICD10 codes for causes   of fetal death as defined by the ICD-10-Mortality   Fetal Manual (2016).  Defined as the following,   a cause of fetal death is the morbid condition   or disease process, abnormality, injury, or poisoning   leading directly to fetal death. The initiating   cause of fetal death is the disease or injury,   which initiated the chain of morbid events   leading directly to death or the circumstances   of the accident or violence, which produced fatal   injury. A fetal death often results from the   combined effect of two or more conditions. These   conditions may be completely unrelated, arising   independently of each other or they may be causally   related to each other; that is, one cause may   lead to another which in turn, leads to a third   cause, etc.
